name: Shetani
movement: walks at 30 ft. and flies at 50 ft.
description: The Shetani is a Medium fiend with magical capabilities. It possesses a high Armor Class and significant hit points, making it a durable opponent. Its skin is likely dark or shadowy, and it has a menacing presence that reflects its malevolent nature.
memorable: The Shetani has the ability to absorb moisture and cause exhaustion in its foes, along with powerful necrotic attacks and versatility in changing forms.
goals: To manipulate and dominate through cruelty and powerful magic.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other fiends or as part of a larger plot involving dark powers.
environment: Commonly found in dark, desolate locations, often tied to infernal or corrupt lands.
strengths: Highly mobile, with resistance to fire and poison, and magical resistance that allows it to effectively counter spell attacks.
weaknesses: Dependent on spells and physical attacks, vulnerable to foes who can outmatch or bypass its defenses.
attacks: Utilizes slashing strikes with claws that also inflict necrotic damage, alongside ranged necrotic attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Desiccating Breath, which can affect multiple foes, draining life and causing exhaustion.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a high passive perception, aiding in detecting hidden threats.
skills: Moderate perception skill enhancing its ability to notice hidden creatures or traps.
additional_information: Can see through magical darkness with Devil’s Sight.
Its attacks count as magical for overcoming resistances.
Can cast a variety of spells to manipulate the battlefield.
Can transform into a beast or humanoid for infiltration.
Has a powerful necrotic damage output with its attacks.
spellcasting: Can cast spells such as Charm Person and Silent Image at will, with access to more powerful spells several times a day.
test_queries: cunning creature that can change shape
creature that drains moisture from foes
